topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541f987963687264fac50100#post_541f987963687264fac50100
Because chicken is a very mild meat. The sauce is really the most important part, it needs to compliment and add to the chicken instead of over powering it. Most restaurants go the latter route unfortunately.

I'm just lucky my housemate is a damn good cook.
